Delivery No data found Please correct your username/password and try again! TabActivity Hello world! Hello world! An Intent is basically a message to say you did or want something to happen. Depending on the pedingIntent, apps or the OS might be listening for it and will react accordingly. Hello World from section: %1$d Please check your Internet Connection Action Order No. Address Customer Name Name Address DONE ID Verified Syncing Location Please specify reason

Go on duty to report your location and availability,as well as to see the list of currently assigned deliveries.
default To use all the features of this application, it is important to allow all permissions All permissions needed to be accepted to use this app. Ok please wait ... Please Enter Username Please Enter Password Please Enter StoreId Click Yes to call support Click Yes to logout from all other devices and login to the current device This will clear all login preferences. Do you want to Log out ? Log out ?
